content: instep and the heel flap and pu 15 heel flap sts knit these ktbl and k across half of the heel sts 9 sts you now have 25 sts on needle 1 32 sts on needle 2 the instep 25 sts on needle 3 decrease every second round by alternating decrease rounds with knitting rounds in pattern without decreasing until you have 16 sts on needle 1 32 sts on needle 2 16 sts on needle 3 decrease round needle 1 k to the last 3 sts of the first needle k2tog k1 needle 2 work across the 32 sts of the instep in rib pattern needle 3 k first st ssk k to end foot work 32 rounds or until the length you desire of st st needle 1 *k7 p1* needle 2 st st needle 3 toe chart work 3 rounds of st st across all of the sts work 7 rounds of the toe chart toe decreases work in st st for 7 rounds work alternating decrease rounds and st st rounds until you have 16 sts left with 4 sts on needles 1 & 3 and 8 sts on needle 2 decrease round needle 1 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 3 k1 ssk k the rest of the sts finishing cut the yarn leaving approx 10 inches weave through the remaining sts using grafting if you re not familiar with how to graft i learned from the invaluable techniques with theresa on knitty unsolicited advice ever hear of second sock syndrome that s where you knit the first sock and lose interest in the second at a knitting meetup in montreal the sagacious ladies around the table asked me if i ever suffered from this looking at me expectantly well always knit the second sock first they pronounced dissolving in laughter soundtrack here s what i listened to while working on this design included but not limited to mark simeon ferguson composer/pianist mark simeon ferguson was born in whyalla south australia on barngala land raised in clare on ngadjuri land and lives in adelaide on kaurna land he is rooted in the jazz tradition but lives in multiple musical worlds ukraine the latest russia s full-scale invasion of ukraine has dominated world news since the tanks jets and troops first rolled over ukraine s borders in february 2022 every weekday the telegraph s top journalists analyse the invasion from all angles and tell you what you need to know madness madness erin and amanda are sisters librarians and sister librarians hailing from scenic central oklahoma and in this series they examine and rank clubs cults mlms and more to determine which one they d most like to join join us for math and questionable singing copyright liza levchuk 2023 for personal use only
